svg.class: group transform transition-all duration-300 origin-center overflow-hidden w-lg h-lg
svg.title: Menu

line.class: transform transition-all duration-300 origin-center group-[.active]:rotate-[45deg] group-[.active]:scale-x-200 group-[.active]:translate-y-xxs group-[.active]:-translate-x-xxs
transform transition-all duration-300 origin-center group-[.active]:-rotate-[45deg] group-[.active]:scale-x-200 group-[.active]:-translate-y-xxs group-[.active]:-translate-x-xxs
